actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act and the Child Nutrition Act to extend certain authorizations of appropriations for 3 additional fiscal years.

summary.text: Extends appropriations for the special food service program for children under the National School Lunch Program through fiscal year 1978. Extends appropriations for the school breakfast program under the Child Nutrition Act through fiscal year 1978. Provides that the program of cash grants to State health departments, Indian, and other agencies for supplemental food to pregnant and lactating women and infants shall continue through fiscal year 1978. Authorizes appropriations of $100,000,000 for fiscal year 1976 and the two succeeding fiscal years for such program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act and the Child Nutrition Act to extend certain authorizations of appropriations for 3 additional fiscal years.
